children.value: Illustrating an infinite library of programming courses
Since April 2015 I've been the art director & lead illustrator for
â€“ a learning website for web developers.

For every course we release, I create a unique illustration that captures the main concept. We use these across our website to help users browse visually, as well as for marketing and promoting the courses.
To date, I've made over 150 of these course illustrations. Here's a small selection...

{`Illustrating an infinite library of programming courses`}


{`Since April 2015 I've been the art director & lead illustrator for `}{`egghead.io`}{` â€“ a learning website for web developers.`}

{`For every course we release, I create a unique illustration that captures the main concept. We use these across our website to help users browse visually, as well as for marketing and promoting the courses.`}
